message: Reality is that which can be observed by the 5 senses...Not your 5 senses, the 5 senses.

America today: A black child with a toy gun on a play ground is a threat. White Gun nuts from the right wing can sieze public buildings and in some states pushed through open-carry.-laws. The Irony, hypocrisy and inequality is thick as smog nowadays!

you watch too much Fox Newz and your mind has become like the inside of a pumpkin: mush! May God put good grace into your hands before writing such misinformed, deceitful ignorance.... Your above pic about ' You've been lied to about everything! ' is so hypocritical, I would laugh at your amusement but since I have a heart... will have pity on you instead... God bless... You sure need a lot of blessing to repair your damaged mind.

Unless is your Nth wedding... Get yourself a wedding photographer (not just any photographer, an actual wedding photographer!). It is after all, a once (or twice, or thrice for some?) in a lifetime event that you want to have amazing pictures of and while yes your family and friends will take photos and all, do you seriously want to leave it to chance? It is hard work, it takes skill, it takes education and practice. Save expenses somewhere else: invite a couple less people, get another venue, maybe even go for other flower arrangements, etc but definitely don't skimp on the photographer!
